type.description:
## Fall Flying

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/fall_flying)

Checks whether the entity is currently fall flying (with an Elytra, an Elytra power, or similar).

Type ID: `origins:fall_flying`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:fall_flying"
}
```
